divs: Sighting DetailsOk, they're back ..My friend called me on my phone and said quick look outside those lights are back. So I went out there, saw nothing at first after about 5 minutes multiple lights came on. Usually they would come on in a row of some sort. This time they came on about 6 of them but staggered, but this time one of the orange lights was actually 3 smaller orange lights grouped into one (if that makes sense). They didn't come back on after that. So if you're in the area please looks the following nights between 9pm-10pm. Last time they came back every night for I can't remember now but I think it was 8 or 9 nights in a row.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around May 4th 2010
